hook.text: She deleted social media for 30 days. By day seven, she noticed something strange: the sky was really beautiful.

buildup.text: Digital detoxes reduce anxiety, improve sleep, and restore attention span. The benefits appear within days.

discovery.text: University of Bath found that a one-week social media break significantly improved well-being and reduced depression.

twist.text: The hardest part is the first 48 hours. Your brain craves the stimulation. After that, clarity and calm replace the urge.

climax.text: Try a weekend detox first. Leave your phone at home for one walk. Notice what you see when you're not looking down.

punchline.text: Take a digital break. You'll notice what you've been missing.

quiz.question: How quickly do digital detox benefits typically appear?
options: Digital detoxes have no measurable effect
